title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client and CLI for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun, browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); model manager, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, Android compatible, Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation persistence, and slash commands.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; ready-to-run Streamlit app.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection helpers, and MAUI sample.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as REST & WebSocket endpoints with Swagger docs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embedding APIs with admin-configurable model list.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; serde models, tokio client.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer pooling and LiveView chat example.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for private and channel-based LLM queries.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for offline AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Community Rust SDK with higher-level builders, mock server for tests, and axum example.
